review: This device is nothing short of amazing.  For the owner of an older television that was (and still is) otherwise high-end but that does not offer access to apps like Amazon Prime and Netflix this is a game-changer.  It is easy to use and install, streams video effortlessly and without the pixelization and degradation of image quality that I have experienced with other devices.  Frankly, for the price there is nothing that even comes close to this level of functionality.  Buy one today - I'd wager you won't regret that decision.

review: The first one didn't work properly....kept pausing in middle of movies or scenes....talked to 3 Amazon service reps, all the way to Jamaica and South Africa....tried repeatedly to fix, , , even had to call and involve my internet provider who trouble shot my system and confirmed my system is very fast and definitely not  the problem....service reps would not send a replacement, finally had to ask for supervisor and requested another one from her....the 2nd one came and NOTHING....completely black screen!!....NOTHING..had to call again and go through the entire phone tree and a 3rd one was sent....had to call for assistance on the 3rd one too, but it is now seemingly working fine. I like the finished product now but would NOT go through everything again.....if this one fails it's going in the trash.
author: Dave Meier

review: I have a smart TV but scrolling and viewing across the smart TV's menu was just too painfully slow, the amazon stick scrolls amazingly fast thru the menu and viewable titles, the remote is intuitive and easy to use, setup took me around 2 minutes, plus you get a free month of amazon prime !  This product is a must have if you do not have a smart TV !  Best $40 ever spent.
